EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi Jhun, It was a pleasure talking with you today. I have requested your pricing be updated and will notify you once it is complete. I have also requested invoicing. Our legal name is the following. Thank you for choosing Grand & Toy. Grand & Toy Limited Kind Regards,
Kyle
Kyle McGuire Business Development Manager, Canada 900 Belfast Road, Ottawa, ON, K1G 0Z6 E-mail: kylemcguire@grandandtoy.com |Tel: 800-348-2184 ext. 44023 Fax: 613-244-0765 Office Supplies | Interiors & Furniture | Print & Documents | Facility Resources | Technology
